description: Scans the input file of IEEE floating point numbers for illegal values: infinities and not-a-number (NaN) values.

fix_illegal_values.title: Fix Illegal Values
fix_illegal_values.description: Writes a copy of the input file to stdout, replacing illegal values with 0.

verbose_mode.title: Verbose Mode
verbose_mode.description: Verbose mode: print out index of each illegal value.

skip_count.title: Skip Initial Locations
skip_count.description: Skip the first n floating point locations (i.e., the first 4*n bytes) in the file

input_file.title: Input Filename
input_file.description: Input file containing IEEE floating point numbers
